If you want to encrypt your disclosure email, you can use this PGP key. --> ### Issue Summary Counter visualizations have no max-width or max-height limit. So they grow to fill all available space on the query screen. ![Screen Shot 2020-07-06 at 10 32 16](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/17067911/86611227-fd4c4600-bf73-11ea-920d-ebd4de28cbd1.png) ### Steps to Reproduce I recreated on the preview instance [here](https://redash-preview.netlify.app/queries/394#681). 1. Write a simple query: `select 80085 "foo"` 2. Make a counter visualization 3. Click **Show Data Only** and observe how large the counter appears ### Technical details: * Redash Version: V9 Beta * Browser/OS: FF / Chrome / Safari * How did you install Redash: SaaS
